body_html:
@woodthom2 @mrry It would be great to update the document for Windows.
And I can confirm that -c opt --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc are the correct and necessary options to use on Windows. Maybe we can also mention this script as an example of how to set up environment variables correctly on Windows, since it's a little bit more complicated than Linux.

body:
@woodthom2 @mrry It would be great to update the document for Windows.
And I can confirm that `-c opt --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc` are the correct and necessary options to use on Windows. Maybe we can also mention [this script](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/common_env.sh) as an example of how to set up environment variables correctly on Windows, since it's a little bit more complicated than Linux.
